00021 void
00022 MessageProcessor::setMethodCallback(int32_t methodId,
00023                                     void* object,
00024                                     void (*FunctionPtr)(void* object,
00025                                                         arguments argList))
00026 {
00027     Callback methodCallback(object, FunctionPtr);
00028     _callbackMap.insert(std::pair<int32_t, Callback>
00029                         (methodId, methodCallback));
00030 }
00031 
00032 void
00033 MessageProcessor::removeMethodCallback(int32_t methodId)
00034 {
00035     _callbackMap.erase(methodId);
00036 }

00038 void
00039 MessageProcessor::executeMethod(int32_t methodId,
00040                                 arguments argList)
00041 {
00042     std::map<int32_t, Callback>::iterator it;
00043 
00044     it = _callbackMap.find(methodId);
00045 
00046     if (it != _callbackMap.end()) {
00047         it->second.execute(argList);
00048     } else {
00049         arguments argList;
00050         i32Arg method;
00051         method.name = "methodId";
00052         method.value = methodId;
00053         
00054         argList.i32Args.push_back(method);
00055         _methodNotImplemented.execute(argList);
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void
00060 MessageProcessor::processPendingItems(int32_t max_count = -1)
00061 {
00062     queueItemList pending_items;
00063     
00064     _client->connect();
00065 
00066     if (max_count == -1) {
00067         pending_items = _client->getPendingItems();
00068     } else {
00069         pending_items = _client->getPendingItems(max_count);
00070     }
00071 
00072     for (std::vector<queueItem>::iterator it = pending_items.items.begin();
00073          it != pending_items.items.end();
00074          it++) {
00075         executeMethod((*it).methodId, (*it).argList);
00076     }
00077 }
